video.title: Breaking Bad
video.synopsis: A high school chemistry teacher dying of cancer teams with a former student to secure his family's future by manufacturing and selling crystal meth.

episodes.synopsis: Diagnosed with terminal lung cancer, a high school chemistry teacher resorts to cooking and selling methamphetamine to provide for his family.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Their first aborted drug deal forces Walt and Jesse to dispose of a pair of corpses. Meanwhile, Skyler suspects that her husband is up to no good.
episodes.title: The Cat's in the Bag

episodes.synopsis: As Walt cleans up the mess that was left after his first drug deal, Skyler gets too close to the truth about his double life.
episodes.title: And the Bag's in the River

episodes.synopsis: Being forced to reveal the truth about his illness leaves Walt facing the dilemma of how to pay for an expensive series of cancer treatments.
episodes.title: Cancer Man

episodes.synopsis: Skyler organizes an intervention to persuade Walt to accept his former research partner's generous offer to pay for the cancer treatments.
episodes.title: Gray Matter

episodes.synopsis: With the side effects and cost of his treatment mounting, Walt demands that Jesse find a wholesaler to buy their drugs -- which lands him in trouble.
episodes.title: Crazy Handful of Nothin'

episodes.synopsis: After Jesse's brush with death, Walt agrees to produce even more drugs for the ruthless Tuco. Meanwhile, Skyler suspects her sister of shoplifting.
episodes.title: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal

episodes.synopsis: As they lay plans for their final big drug deals, Walt and Jesse worry that their sole buyer will think nothing of killing them when it suits him.
episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven

episodes.synopsis: As a DEA manhunt for Tuco gets under way, Skyler enlists Hank in the search for Walt.
episodes.title: Grilled

episodes.synopsis: As Hank comes dangerously close to uncovering Walt's role in the drug trade, he devises a plan to cover his tracks.
episodes.title: Bit by a Dead Bee

episodes.synopsis: With Walt struggling to bridge the growing gulf between him and Skyler, Jesse finds himself without a home after his parents evict him.
episodes.title: Down

episodes.synopsis: Hank tries to pull himself together after his encounter with Tuco. Meanwhile, Jesse assembles a crew to get more product on the street.
episodes.title: Breakage

episodes.synopsis: As Jesse pursues the addicts who stole Skinny Pete's drug supply, Walt devises a cover story to explain how he's been paying for his treatments.
episodes.title: Peekaboo

episodes.synopsis: As Jesse's reputation as a drug lord leads Walt to push for expansion of the operation, Hank's foray into the DEA's El Paso office leaves him shaken.
episodes.title: Negro y Azul

episodes.synopsis: Badger's arrest forces Walt and Jesse into league with a shady lawyer.
episodes.title: Better Call Saul

episodes.synopsis: Worried that he doesn't have much longer to live, Walt looks to provide for his family by enlisting Jesse for a marathon meth-cooking session.
episodes.title: 4 Days Out

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of good news about his cancer treatments, Walt turns on his brother-in-law before focusing his attention on making things right at home.
episodes.title: Over

episodes.synopsis: As the end of her pregnancy finds Skyler conflicted about her feelings, a dealer's death forces Walt to look for somewhere to unload a load of meth.
episodes.title: Mandala

episodes.synopsis: After missing his daughter's birth to complete a big drug deal, Walt squares off with Jesse's girlfriend over his share of the cash.
episodes.title: Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: Walt tries to put his and Jesse's lives back on track as he prepares for surgery and looks to keep his money source a secret from Skyler and Walt Jr.
episodes.title: ABQ

episodes.synopsis: Skyler forces Walt to move out in the wake of the airline disaster, while Jesse's rehab helps him come to grips with his role in the collision.
episodes.title: No Más

episodes.synopsis: With Skyler set on divorce, an unwitting Walt lands squarely in the crosshairs of two Mexican drug cartel hit men who are looking for revenge.
episodes.title: Caballo Sin Nombre

episodes.synopsis: The tension mounts as Walt calls Skyler's bluff and moves back home without her consent, and Jesse ponders re-entering the drug trade.
episodes.title: I.F.T.

episodes.synopsis: Walt gets involved when a new batch of meth puts Jesse back in business. Meanwhile, Skyler's affair with her boss is creating chaos.
episodes.title: Green Light

episodes.synopsis: As Skyler reconsiders her objections to Walt's return, he mulls over returning to the drug trade. Also, Hank's obsession promises trouble for Jesse.
episodes.title: Mas

episodes.synopsis: The discovery of Walt and Jesse's old RV forces them to act fast just as Walt resumes business in Gus's state-of-the-art meth lab.
episodes.title: Sunset

episodes.synopsis: When Hank risks his career by attacking Jesse, Jesse vows to retaliate with a lawsuit, and Skyler looks to Walt to stop Jesse from pressing charges.
episodes.title: One Minute

episodes.synopsis: With Hank clinging to life after surviving the drug cartel's attack, Walt looks to ward off trouble by taking on Jesse as a partner.
episodes.title: I See You

episodes.synopsis: While the prospects for Hank's recovery place Marie at odds with their insurance company, Jesse looks for a way to increase his take.
episodes.title: Kafkaesque

episodes.synopsis: A long, tense night in the meth lab pits Walt and Jesse against a pesky fly that refuses to die, no matter what they do.
episodes.title: Fly

episodes.synopsis: Hank is unhappy with the pace of his recovery, Skyler questions Saul's money-laundering scheme, and Jesse falls for a fellow rehab patient.
episodes.title: Abiquiu

episodes.synopsis: Jesse pursues the dealers who orchestrated Combo's murder, Hank refuses to leave the hospital, and Skyler presses Walt to accept her scheme.
episodes.title: Half Measure

episodes.synopsis: After taking out two of his boss's street dealers, Walt realizes that Gus is planning to kill him and Jesse and replace him with his former assistant.
episodes.title: Full Measure

episodes.synopsis: After a tense third-season cliffhanger that saw Walt and Jesse laboring for their lives, they wait anxiously to see what Gus will do next.
episodes.title: Box Cutter

episodes.synopsis: While Walt prepares his defense against Gus, Jesse copes with the pressure by renewing his friendship with Badger and Skinny Pete.
episodes.title: Thirty-Eight Snub

episodes.synopsis: While Walt worries about Gus's interference and Jesse's increasingly fragile state of mind, Skyler steps up the pressure to get what she wants.
episodes.title: Open House

episodes.synopsis: As Skyler concocts an elaborate story to explain the Whites' finances, a worried Walt discovers that Hank has begun a new investigation.
episodes.title: Bullet Points

episodes.synopsis: Jesse rides shotgun with Mike on a perilous run of pickups, prompting Walt to worry that his partner is about to be killed.
episodes.title: Shotgun

episodes.synopsis: Skyler adopts an aloof approach when she suspects that Walt isn't telling her the truth. Meanwhile, Jesse proves his worth to Mike and Gus.
episodes.title: Cornered

episodes.synopsis: Ordered to return the car he bought for his son, Walt strikes back by putting Skyler in a tough spot with their new money-laundering operation.
episodes.title: Problem Dog

episodes.synopsis: When Hank produces evidence that Gus is Albuquerque's crystal meth kingpin, Walt worries that he and Jesse will be killed to protect their boss.
episodes.title: Hermanos

episodes.synopsis: While Walt tries to subvert Hank's probe into the Albuquerque meth scene, a deadly warning forces Gus to consider a deal with the Mexican cartel.
episodes.title: Bug

episodes.synopsis: With a badly battered Walt still recovering from the fight, Gus drags Jesse with him to Mexico to seal the deal with the cartel.
episodes.title: Salud

episodes.synopsis: While Skyler pressures Ted to accept her money to pay his taxes, Gus insists that Jesse should resume working in the lab alone.
episodes.title: Crawl Space

episodes.synopsis: While ordering his family to take advantage of the protection that the DEA is offering Hank, Walt awaits whatever fate is in store for him.
episodes.title: End Times

episodes.synopsis: When their plan to kill Gus falls through, Walt and Jesse must act quickly to cover their tracks and avoid certain death.
episodes.title: Face Off

episodes.synopsis: Walt goes to see his family, still under guard, while dealing with the aftermath of the explosion at Casa Tranquila.
episodes.title: Live Free Or Die

episodes.synopsis: Walt and Jesse decide to look for a new partner to help them in their latest scheme. The DEA sifts through various leads, hoping to find something.
episodes.title: Madrigal

episodes.synopsis: To Skyler's dismay, Walter moves back into the house. Walter, Mike and Jesse meet with Saul to talk about finding a new place to cook.
episodes.title: Hazard Pay

episodes.synopsis: As Lydia gives up her own employee to the DEA, Mike offers her a replacement: Jesse. Walt and Skyler argue about whether the family is safe.
episodes.title: Fifty-One

episodes.synopsis: Mike and Lydia work to get the methylamine transported for the operation. Walt and Jesse try to come up with a plan that won't blow their cover.
episodes.title: Dead Freight

episodes.synopsis: Walt, Mike and Jesse deal with the repercussions of the methylamine heist. Mike and Jesse want out, but Walt is determined to build his empire.
episodes.title: Buyout

episodes.synopsis: Walter tries to strike up a deal with Declan. Told to lay off Mike, Hank switches his focus to the lawyer who's been paying off Mike's men.
episodes.title: Say My Name

episodes.synopsis: Walt meets with Lydia to get the names of Mike's people in prison. Skyler makes another attempt to convince Walt to give up cooking meth.
episodes.title: Gliding Over All

episodes.synopsis: As Walt and Jesse adjust to life out of the business, Hank grapples with a troubling lead.
episodes.title: Blood Money

episodes.synopsis: While Skyler's past catches up with her, Walt covers his tracks. Jesse continues to struggle with his guilt.
episodes.title: Buried

episodes.synopsis: Jesse decides to make a change, while Walt and Skyler try to deal with an unexpected demand.
episodes.title: Confessions

episodes.synopsis: An unusual strategy starts to bear fruit, while plans are set in motion that could change everything.
episodes.title: Rabid Dog

episodes.synopsis: Things heat up for Walt in unexpected ways.
episodes.title: To'hajiilee

episodes.synopsis: As the series draws to a close, everyone copes with radically changed circumstances.
episodes.title: Ozymandias

episodes.synopsis: In the penultimate episode of the series, events set in motion long ago move toward a conclusion.
episodes.title: Granite State

episodes.synopsis: The award-winning series comes to a dramatic conclusion in the series finale.
episodes.title: Felina
